directions: In a bowl whisk together mayonnaise, sour cream, chili paste, adobo sauce, and salt to taste. Dip may be made 2 days ahead and chilled, covered.
ingredients: 2 canned chipotle chilies in adobo sauce,* minced to a paste (about 1 tablespoon), plus 1/2 teaspoon adobo sauce
24 small carrots, trimmed, or 12 large carrots, cut into sticks
*available at Hispanic markets and some specialty foods shops
title: Chipotle Mayonnaise Dip with Carrots
